posts.post_content:
Looking to go a different direction with my collection, slightly. These are cards I’m looking for. Just a disclaimer that the cards I have in “common backs” will only be available for sale after upgrading backs or available for trade in case the person is looking to downgrade from a tougher back to common back. Wishful thinking I know. Some cards are more of a priority thank others, just a FYI. 

Searching for the following in a non Piedmont/SC/PB backs:

Baker (Have a 3 Piedmont for trade or sale)
Beckley (Have a 3.5 PB for trade or sale)
Bresnahan -batting (Have a 3.5 Piedmont for trade or sale)
